sentences.en: Caution: - to Prevent electric shock Do Not Immerse in Water.
sentences.cn: 注意: 不可浸没在水中,以防电击.

sentences.en: Condensing this dense material will take immerse expense and intense work.
sentences.cn: 压缩这一密度大的物质将花费巨大的开支及紧张的工作.

sentences.en: Do not immerse in water and do not use to vacuum water.
sentences.cn: 不要浸入水中,也不要用于吸取液体.

sentences.en: Does not want to let oneself immerse in the sad atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 不想让自己沉浸在难过的氛围中.

sentences.en: He left school at 16 and immersed himself in the Labour Party.
sentences.cn: 他16岁离开学校投身工党。

sentences.en: He's really becoming immersed in his work.
sentences.cn: 他真正地变得专注于自己的工作。

sentences.en: I immerse my clothes in the water.
sentences.cn: 我把衣服浸在水里.

sentences.en: Immerse the cloth in the boiling dye!
sentences.cn: 把布浸到沸腾的染料中去!

sentences.en: Immerse the cloth in the dye for twenty minutes.
sentences.cn: 把布浸在染料里20分钟.

sentences.en: Immerse the plant ( in water ) for a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 把那棵植物 ( 在水里 ) 浸泡几分钟.

sentences.en: Immerse the whole hardware in the solution and soak for 10 - 15 minutes.
sentences.cn: 将餐具器皿完全浸入溶液内约10-15分钟.

sentences.en: Immerse your foot in ice cold water to reduce the swelling.
sentences.cn: 把你的脚泡在冰水里以便消肿.

sentences.en: Immerse yourself in a 3 D world with realistic physics based game - play!
sentences.cn: 沉浸于一种3D世界与现实物理为基础的游戏玩!

sentences.en: Or immerse with 10 ％ glacial acetic acid brothers, wipe next.
sentences.cn: 或用10%冰醋酸浸泡手足, 然后擦干.

sentences.en: She immersed herself in her work.
sentences.cn: 她埋头工作。

sentences.en: The electrodes are immersed in liquid.
sentences.cn: 电极被浸没在液体中。

sentences.en: The simplest procedure is to immerse the stoppered bottle to the required depth.
sentences.cn: 最简单的方法是将带塞的瓶子浸没在需要的深度.

sentences.en: The translator has to immerse himself in the world of the poet.
sentences.cn: 译者必须完全投入诗人的世界.

sentences.en: Treat the children as equals, and immerse our hearts into their world.
sentences.cn: 平等交流, 用心了解孩子世界.

sentences.en: When you immerse yourself in the emotion, and realize that it is only emotion, it loses its control.
sentences.cn: 当你沉浸于那种情绪之中，并且认识到它只是一种情绪而已时，你就摆脱了它的控制。

phrases.tran_cn: 全神贯注于，专心于；把…浸入水中

trans.tran_en: to become or make sb completely involved in sth

trans.tran_cn: 浸没，施浸礼，沉迷…中，陷入
trans.tran_en: to put someone or something deep into a liquid so that they are completely covered
